name: Deep Blue Spearfishing
description: Your guide on your spearfishing trip in the blue waters of Playa del Carmen is Diego. A passionate hunter, biologist as well, and speaks perfectly Spanish and English. Whether you're looking for a Jurassic Park Wahoo or an over-sized Snapper, we will bring you to the right spots outside the waters of Playa del Carmen Mexico. You will travel to the clear deep blue, where you will encounter many exciting species. All is possible when you go spearfishing with us in the blue waters of Playa del Carmen. You can bring your own gear or use ours. We accept cancellations up to 48 hours before your scheduled trip for a full refund. Come for an authentic spearfishing adventure, book today to reserve your prefered date!
